rows.Name: DCS
rows.Comment: Describes the transformation from DCS to MCS.dX, dY, dZ describe the offset of the DCS relative to the MCS.(The vector from the origin of the MCS to the origin of the DCS,expressed in MCS coordinates)dA1, â¦, dA5 describe the offset of the additional axes P, Q, U, V, W.If OriConv = SMC_ORI_CONVENTION.ADDAXES, dA, dB, and dC describean offset for each coordinate.If OriConv <> SMC_ORI_CONVENTION.ADDAXES, then the members dA, dB, dCdescribe the rotation from DCS to MCS.
